content: I have some back-of-mind ideas for the playground that would use websockets. Are there any infra-y concerns that we might have around that area?
idle connections take lots of ports up? not beyond that though.
Yeah, but even if everyone used a websocket (which they wouldn’t, to start) I don’t think our concurrent user count would prove to be big enough
Sounds encouraging then. Just have to see how hard what I want to do is.
